creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: red and blue dominate vertical panel; embroidery and applique, red on red with white outlining; birds, flowers, dragons; two squares: two black roosters surrounded by scroll work in top; bottom square has dragons, birds, medallions with silkworms (?); multicolored silk or rayon ribbons separate main body from blue and green edging of metallic brocade, floral fabric; some yellow metal outlining; indigo woven patterned lining
medium: Cotton, silk and/or rayon, yellow metal; needlework
title: Baby Carrier
